#summary Istallation under Windows
#labels Phase-Deploy
= StartOS Install =

Please watch: 
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kDQFkJJ4IL8

Or read:

     No need to perform formatting NAND Flash.

 In Archive STARTOS.rar there is DNW.exe utility for Windows (XP or 7).

 1. Turn off power.

 2. Connect USB cable and COM cable to Board simultaneously.

 3. Move switch S2 in NOR position.

 4. Run DNW.exe on Desktop or Notebook/Netbook.

 5. Turn on Power by S1.

 6. On DNW window in Configuration Option Check: Com Number (1),115200 kBod, and address 0x33d00000 (0x30000000 is suitable too).

 7. On DNW in Left Upper corner {Serial Port} Press Connect. Now your Computer plays terminal role.

 8. Press {Enter} (for List of commands) or {d} (for SDRAM load&start)  on Desktop Computer Keyboard.

 9. On {USB Port} select Transmit/Restore.

10. Find and point to StartOS.bin.

11. Program must start immediately.

12. Your old system in NAND Flash stays unchanged.

   Then if you wish you may perform {a} command, Switch S2 to NAND and work with StartOS.
